TopicTitle: Space Launch System block 1 Crew Mk 2

Articles.Content:
The SLS is a manned rocket desined to take people farther than before. It will take us to an asteroid and eventually Mars or in KSP Duna. It is the most powerful rocket that will be built (For now) and is stated to launch for the first time 2017.

In my last upload of the SLS I had a tiny rocket that had very unscaled parts, but now with BobCats american pack, I got an MPCV (Orion+Service Module+Launch Escape Tower, etc.) and also have the Booster that are the same scale as the real one so now it looks even more realistic. I was also able to stop all the parts from braking at launch and needing the unbreakable parts cheat.

Bug: When you are about to start using the second (Upper Stage) disable the Orions Service modules Cross Feed. For some reason the second stage engine drains it.

DOWNLOAD

https://www.dropbox.com/s/48u5nfiq92eogb7/SLS%20Block%201%20Crew.zip

Mods Used:

Bobcats American Pack 0.20.x

Part Generator 2.2.2

Jool V 0.18.1

It works Perfectly with either Mech Jeb 1.9.7 or 2.0

If there are some parts missing let me know.

Edited June 1, 2013 by astroadrian99
ummm... were are the solid boosters from

ummm... were are the solid boosters from

BobCats however I had to do some modifications to allow radial attachment and just made it a little cone on the top.
Nobody has said anything about any parts missing or any bugs so I am guessing the download has everything you need with no bugs, am I correct.
No, the parts are missing the PART{} tags and several parts are in the wrong file format. Plus you don't need a decoupler the Orion service module, it has a built in decoupler.
